sentence: Apparently the rooms climate control is on a motion sensor so no matter what you set it to it stops working when there is no movement in the room
So I get to pay more for a lower quality room
We did have a mishap with our room key
Had we not had the snafu with the room we could have enjoyed more of the Disneyland Park on Saturday
Otherwise it is closer to a 4 due to the fact that the rooms could use a little updating
Check in unfortunately was a real hassle and I felt they tried to get us to take a room with construction outside
It took 30 minutes for a maintenance person to come to our room and he could not open the door

You can hear babies crying and normal volume conversations as if they were in your romThere are not enough electrical outlets in the room especially near the bed which is where I like to charge my phone
Rooms are very standard with some requiring a long walk down hallways from the elevator

We checked in early Sunday for our 3 night stay the view from our first accessible room overlooked a shingled rooftop and our sliding bathroom door was broken off the hinges and the room smelled like exhaust from the exhaust pipes outside our patio view rooftop view
We were able to fill it with water sodas etc for our whole trip
The room was clean spacious and inviting
Amazing rain shower
This hotel is always worth a visit especially when it is decked out for the Christmas season
The RomThey were hotel rooms
The lobby is huge with fireplaces and tvs with cartoons for the little ones and typically someone playing piano
The rooms were clean and furnishings in good condition
so they offered to store our luggage and texted us a couple of hours later that our room was ready for us
I was granted my request for a theme park view room
Room service was fast
